backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, related files, components, and test IDs for the project.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-written summaries describing the purpose and design style of various frontend files and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables and global theme tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document setting metadata and loading the React application root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes and wraps all pages with a shared header and footer layout.
frontend/src/components/layout/PageShell: Generic page wrapper component providing layout, titles, and optional narrow or centered formatting.
frontend/src/components/marketing/sectio: Renders an about section with agency background details and a grid of core values displayed as cards. Uses SectionShell for layout and lucide-react icons for value items.
Implements a call‑to‑action block with an email signup form, promotional text, and business guarantees. Handles simple form submission via local state.
Displays the hero area with headline, CTAs, trust indicators, and a visual stats card layout. Includes scrolling handlers to navigate to contact and services sections.
Provides structured legal content including a privacy policy with headings, sections, and lists. Uses SectionShell for layout and renders dynamically dated update text.
Shows a four‑step workflow using cards with icons, numbers, and descriptions. Presented in a responsive grid inside a SectionShell wrapper.
Displays key business metrics with icons, values, and short descriptions in a grid. Emphasizes social proof and company achievements.
A wrapper component applying background variants and layout classes to marketing sections. Accepts children, variant, id, and className for flexible section styling.
Renders a service catalog with cards listing descriptions and feature bullets for each offering. Includes a scroll-to-contact handler and uses SectionShell for structure.
Renders a testimonials section showing client quotes, ratings, and avatars using cards in a grid layout.
frontend/src/components/marketing/SiteFo: Responsive footer with navigation links, branding, social icons, and sectioned content.
frontend/src/components/marketing/SiteHe: Sticky responsive header with navigation, scroll styling, mobile menu, and call‑to‑action buttons.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/CaseSt: Displays a clickable case study card with image, industry badge, summary text, and key outcome metrics.
frontend/src/content/blogPosts.ts: Exports an array of blog post metadata including slugs, titles, excerpts, authors, dates, categories, and read times.
frontend/src/content/caseStudies.ts: Defines detailed case study data with challenges, approaches, outcomes, services, and testimonials for multiple projects.
frontend/src/content/companyPages.ts: Provides structured company page content including mission, values, services, stats, industries, and certifications.
frontend/src/content/legalPolicies.ts: Contains privacy and cookie policy content with sections describing data practices, rights, and compliance details.
frontend/src/content/reviews.ts: Exports an array of detailed client review objects with quotes, outcomes, and project info.
frontend/src/content/services.ts: Defines a list of service descriptions including deliverables, processes, outcomes, and related services.
frontend/src/content/siteCopy.ts: Provides marketing copy for hero, proof metrics, and CTA sections of the site.
frontend/src/content/types.ts: Declares TypeScript interfaces for case studies, services, blog posts, and reviews.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context and provider for authentication, exposing login, logout, and identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for future React Query hooks with no current implementation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS layers, theme variables, typography, and utility classes for styling.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function combining clsx and tailwind-merge to merge class names.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, loading global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page using company content to display mission, values, team, approach, and a contact CTA.
frontend/src/pages/AmsDigitalProfilePage: Shows the company's profile including services, stats, industries, and certifications from structured content.
frontend/src/pages/BlogsPage.tsx: Lists blog posts with category, date, read time, excerpt, and author in a responsive card grid.
frontend/src/pages/CaseStudyDetailPage.t: Displays a detailed case study page with hero info, metrics, challenge, approach, outcome, and navigation back to the portfolio.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements a contact form with client-side submission feedback and fields for user inquiries.
frontend/src/pages/CookiePolicyPage.tsx: Renders the cookie policy with sections sourced from legal content.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerReviewsPage.t: Shows customer reviews with ratings, quotes, outcomes, and client details.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page with hero content, proof metrics, featured case studies, and calls to action.
frontend/src/pages/PortfolioPage.tsx: Displays all case studies in a grid using CaseStudyCard components.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Renders the Privacy Policy page by displaying policy metadata and looping through sections in styled cards. Uses PageShell layout and content from legalPolicies.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceDetailPage.tsx: Displays a detailed view of a selected service, including overview, deliverables, process steps, and outcomes, with category-based styling. Handles missing services and navigation back to the listing.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Shows categorized lists of services with cards that link to individual service detail pages. Uses PageShell layout and dynamic filtering by service category.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom theming, color tokens, container settings, extended utilities, and animation keyframes. Includes typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, goals, features, and image requirements for building an AMS Digital–style marketing site. Tracks requirements, architecture notes, and versioning.
